2164.subject: SBS
2164.descrlong: This course examines the "communist experiment" in the 21st century by comparing and contrasting three communist countries, China, Vietnam, and Cuba. They all have close ties with the US and are facing dilemmas of transforming from central planning to socialist market economy, such as income inequality, financial instability and labor issues. Field trips and case studies in one of these countries will give students valuable real-life experiences to understand the class themes.
